column5: Hello again everyone,  Maybe somebody could help me out. I like fishing for bass and pike and I am looking for spots to go fishing with a couple of my friends this Saturday. I am located about 75 km Southwest of Toronto, near Hamilton Ontario. I am willing to drive anywhere up to 200-250 km hours away from my location. I would love to get somewhere I can rent a boat this time of year. Even if your unsure how the fishing is at the place I will still take any recommendations because I am willing to try out the spot.  Hope to hear from you, Thanks guys!

Was at Berford yesterday 2 smbass 14" & 15" the boats are pulled & for sale, while talking to the owners they said there's a good chance the ramp will be closed next year for every one, they are not impressed with the Conservation Authority's lack of controlling the water level, apparently an older gentleman got pinned between the dock & his boat and shook them up pretty good. I believe they said they pay $900.00 to the Government for a Marina permit per year Richard
$900 doesn't seem bad... figure at $10/launch that's only 90 boats... i'm sure they do way more than that on the launch...
